document.full_text: germany's economy minister told a closed meeting of business leaders that berlin's sudden u-turn on nuclear power was based on electoral politics and was 'not rational', a newspaper reported on thursday.
document.title: german minister says nuclear u-turn "not rational": report
lines_and_colors: germany's economy minister told a closed meeting of business leaders that berlin's sudden u-turn on nuclear power was based on electoral politics and was 'not rational', a newspaper reported on thursday.
